p: In addition, SARS-CoV-2 uses the same receptor, angiotensin II converting enzyme (ACE2) as SARS-CoV. Although the specific pathway of transmission from natural reservoirs to humans is unclear ( Peter et al., 2020; Tang et al., 2020), several studies have shown that pangolin may confer partial spike genes to SARS-CoV-2; The critical functional regions of the spike protein SAR-CoV-2 are nearly the same as those defined in viruses isolated from a pangolin ( Tang et al., 2020).
